H0.text: who discovered that neural communication between cells occurs through chemicals. Santiago Ram√≥n y Cajal

H1.text: who discovered that neural communication between cells occurs through chemicals. Otto Loewi

H2.text: who discovered that neural communication between cells occurs through chemicals. Henry Hallett Dale

H3.text: who discovered that neural communication between cells occurs through chemicals. Charles Sherrington

A4.text: Loewi's experiment demonstrated that a chemical substance released by the vagus nerve could control heart rate, proving chemical transmission.

A5.text: Loewi's experiment was the first to demonstrate the endogenous release of a chemical substance causing a response without electrical stimulation.
